title: Creep: Impeached, CATS Reviews 12.20.19
itunes:title: Creep: Impeached, CATS Reviews 12.20.19
description:
In episode 540, Jack and special guest host Laci Mosley are joined by comedian Debra DiGiovanni to discuss the reviews for Cats, Trump being impeached and is his obsession with toilet flushing, Lev Parnas getting one million dollars, Camila Cabello's racist Tumblr posts, the concern for Britney Spears, JK Rowling's transphobia, A$AP Rocky's sex tape, Netflix's gay Jesus movie sparking outrage, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. ‘Cats’ Film Review: Andrew Lloyd Webber’s Feline Fantasy Musical Becomes a Garish Hairball
  2. Cats Is Good. Cats Is Bad. Cats Is Cats.
  3. The Cats Movie Is a Void of Horny Confusion
  4. Trump Impeached for Abuse of Power and Obstruction of Congress
  5. Donald Trump Was Impeached. Then He Yelled About Toilets.
  6. As He's Impeached, Trump Denies to Rally-Goers That He Always Has to Flush the Toilet 10 Times
  7. President Trump Is Wrong — Toilets Are Good Now. Here’s Why.
  8. Despite $1 Million From Oligarch Firtash, Judge Allows Parnas To Stay Free
  9. Camila Cabello apologizes for ‘embarrassingly ignorant’ remarks
  10. exposing camila cabello‘s racist and downright disturbing tumblr reblogs: a thread
  11. Britney Spears calls out trolls who write ‘mean’ comments and ‘bully people’ on her Instagram
  12. JK Rowling in row over court ruling on transgender issues
  13. The internet is unimpressed with alleged A$AP Rocky sex tape
  14. The First Temptation of Christ |Netflix Original
  15. Over 700,000 Petition to Ban Netflix's 'Gay Jesus' Xmas Film in Brazil
  16. LGBT rights threatened in Brazil under new far-right president
  17. WATCH: Portugal. The Man - So American

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
